#summary How to bootstrap iNetHack on Mac OS X.
#labels nethack,bootstrapping

= Introduction =

I could have sworn I had created a page for this, but apparently not ...

= Details =

All commands to be executed from nethack top level directory.

Create makefiles:

  * cd sys/unix; sh setup.sh

Make sure config.h #defines TTY_GRAPHICS, not IPHONE_GRAPHICS!

Create game:
  * make

*This should be it*. The following are some details you most probably won't need if you build the whole game.

Create date.h:

  * cd util ; make
  * cd src ; ../util/makedefs -v

Create dungeons:

  * cd util ; make dgn_comp
  * cd dat ; make dungeon
